member.name: T:MatlabFunctionsNative.Retinex
member.summary:
The Retinex class provides a CLS compliant, Object (native) interface to the M-functions contained in the files:
D:\Knowledge\Talking Glasses\Faculty Tasks\Image Processing Tasks\Matlab\M-Files\FastRetinex.m
D:\Knowledge\Talking Glasses\Faculty Tasks\Image Processing Tasks\Matlab\M-Files\MSR.m
D:\Knowledge\Talking Glasses\Faculty Tasks\Image Processing Tasks\Matlab\M-Files\SingleScaleRetinex.m
deployprint.m
printdlg.m

member.name: M:MatlabFunctionsNative.Retinex.WaitForFiguresToDie
member.summary: This method will cause a MATLAB figure window to behave as a modal dialog box. The method will not return until all the figure windows associated with this component have been closed.
member.remarks: An application should only call this method when required to keep the MATLAB figure window from disappearing. Other techniques, such as calling Console.ReadLine() from the application should be considered where possible.

member.name: M:MatlabFunctionsNative.Histogram.WaitForFiguresToDie
member.summary: This method will cause a MATLAB figure window to behave as a modal dialog box. The method will not return until all the figure windows associated with this component have been closed.
member.remarks: An application should only call this method when required to keep the MATLAB figure window from disappearing. Other techniques, such as calling Console.ReadLine() from the application should be considered where possible.
